about.summary: Tidies up the forecasting modeling and prediction work flow, extends the 'broom' package with 'sw_tidy', 'sw_glance', 'sw_augment', and 'sw_tidy_decomp' functions for various forecasting models, and enables converting 'forecast' objects to "tidy" data frames with 'sw_sweep'.

Tidies up the forecasting modeling and prediction work flow, extends the 'broom' package with 'sw_tidy', 'sw_glance', 'sw_augment', and 'sw_tidy_decomp' functions for various forecasting models, and enables converting 'forecast' objects to "tidy" data frames with 'sw_sweep'.

name: r-sweep
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-sweep
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/sweep_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/sweep/sweep_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cb1164cd87757b9e9c97c8621748ced84bb861635cfdc121f2463e7fd99c3ac1

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-broom >=0.5.6
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-forecast >=8.0
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-rlang
    - r-tibble >=1.2
    - r-tidyquant
    - r-tidyr >=1.0.0
    - r-tidyverse
    - r-timetk >=2.1.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-broom >=0.5.6
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-forecast >=8.0
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-rlang
    - r-tibble >=1.2
    - r-tidyquant
    - r-tidyr >=1.0.0
    - r-tidyverse
    - r-timetk >=2.1.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('sweep')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('sweep')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/business-science/sweep
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Tidies up the forecasting modeling and prediction work flow, extends the 'broom' package with 'sw_tidy', 'sw_glance', 'sw_augment', and 'sw_tidy_decomp' functions for various forecasting models, and enables converting 'forecast' objects to "tidy" data frames with 'sw_sweep'.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mxr-conda
    - oblute
    - rluria14
    - benhuff

# Date: 2019-10-08

# Maintainer: Matt Dancho <mdancho@business-science.io>
# Description: Tidies up the forecasting modeling and prediction work flow, extends the 'broom' package with 'sw_tidy', 'sw_glance', 'sw_augment', and 'sw_tidy_decomp' functions for various forecasting models, and enables converting 'forecast' objects to "tidy" data frames with 'sw_sweep'.
# URL: https://github.com/business-science/sweep
# BugReports: https://github.com/business-science/sweep/issues
